sentence: He supports Ukraine and the Ukrainian President's efforts to defend their country against Russian aggression, but does not want America drawn into another conflict through emotional manipulation.? Shortly after WRAL published the video, Cawthorn tweeted that Russian President Vladimir Putin's actions are disgusting? but claimed that propaganda is being used to entice America into another war? and said leaders, including Zelensky, should NOT push misinformation on America.? North Carolina state senator Chuck Edwards, who is challenging Cawthorn in the Republican primary, pushed back against the congressman's claims, writing in a tweet, Let's be clear.
author: Brittany Bernstein
title: Madison Cawthorn Calls Zelensky a Thug,' Accuses Ukrainian Government of Pushing Woke Ideologies'

sentence: Some are nuisance candidates, but others are serious, such as GOP district chair Michele Woodhouse and Chuck Edwards, a state senator who represents a significant chunk of the new seat.
title: Opinion: Madison Cawthorn is in trouble. And it's entirely his own fault.

sentence: North Carolina Republican Senator Thom Tillis told CNN this week that he intends to support Cawthorn's Republican opponent, state Senator Chuck Edwards, as he attempts to defeat Cawthorn in the May primaries.

title: GOP Senators From Madison Cawthorn's State Won't Back His Re-Election Bid

sentence: Meanwhile, other GOP figures like Thom Tillis, a senator from Cawthorn's home state, promptly backed one of Cawthorn's primary challengers, Chuck Edwards, while accusing the congressman of embarrassing the GOP.

title: Madison Cawthorn criticized GOP leaders for 'weakening' and 'cheapening' the Republican party's platform and chasing 'non-existent middle-ground voters'
